verses.verse: Then came <WH935> <WH8799> David <WH1732> to Nob <WH5011> to Ahimelech <WH288> the Kohen <WH3548>: and Ahimelech <WH288> was afraid <WH2729> <WH8799> at the meeting <WH7125> <WH8800> of David <WH1732>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Why art thou alone, and no man <WH376> with thee?

And David <WH1732> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Ahimelech <WH288> the Kohen <WH3548>, The king <WH4428> hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> me a business <WH1697>, and hath said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Let no man <WH376> know <WH3045> <WH8799> any thing <WH3972> of the business <WH1697> whereabout I send <WH7971> <WH8802> thee, and what I have commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thee: and I have appointed <WH3045> <WH8776> my servants <WH5288> to such <WH6423> and such <WH492> a place <WH4725>.
Now therefore what is <WH3426> under thine hand <WH3027>? give <WH5414> <WH8798> me five <WH2568> loaves of bread <WH3899> in mine hand <WH3027>, or what there is present <WH4672> <WH8737>.

And the Kohen <WH3548> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> David <WH1732>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, There is no common <WH2455> bread <WH3899> under mine hand <WH3027>, but there is <WH3426> hallowed <WH6944> bread <WH3899>; if the young men <WH5288> have kept <WH8104> <WH8738> themselves at least <WH389> from women <WH802>.

And David <WH1732> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> the Kohen <WH3548>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Of a truth <WH518> women <WH802> have been kept <WH6113> <WH8803> from us about these three <WH8032> days <WH8543>, since I came out <WH3318> <WH8800>, and the vessels <WH3627> of the young men <WH5288> are holy <WH6944>, and the bread is in a manner <WH1870> common <WH2455>, yea, though it were sanctified <WH6942> <WH8799> this day <WH3117> in the vessel <WH3627>.

So the Kohen <WH3548> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> him hallowed <WH6944> bread: for there was no bread <WH3899> there but the shewbread <WH3899> <WH6440>, that was taken <WH5493> <WH8716> from before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, to put <WH7760> <WH8800> hot <WH2527> bread <WH3899> in the day <WH3117> when it was taken away <WH3947> <WH8736>.

Now a certain man <WH376> of the servants <WH5650> of Saul <WH7586> was there that day <WH3117>, detained <WH6113> <WH8737> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>; and his name <WH8034> was Doeg <WH1673>, an Edomite <WH130>, the chiefest <WH47> of the herdmen <WH7462> <WH8802> that belonged to Saul <WH7586>.

And David <WH1732> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Ahimelech <WH288>, And is there <WH3426> not <WH371> here under thine hand <WH3027> spear <WH2595> or sword <WH2719>? for I have neither brought <WH3947> <WH8804> my sword <WH2719> nor my weapons <WH3627> with me <WH3027>, because the king's <WH4428> business <WH1697> required <WH1961> <WH8804> haste <WH5169> <WH8803>.

And the Kohen <WH3548> said <WH559> <WH8799>, The sword <WH2719> of Goliath <WH1555> the Philistine <WH6430>, whom thou slewest <WH5221> <WH8689> in the valley <WH6010> of Elah <WH425>, behold, it is here wrapped <WH3874> <WH8803> in a cloth <WH8071> behind <WH310> the ephod <WH646>: if thou wilt take <WH3947> <WH8799> that, take <WH3947> <WH8798> it: for there is no other <WH312> save <WH2108> that here <WH2088>. And David <WH1732> said <WH559> <WH8799>, There is none like that; give <WH5414> <WH8798> it me.

And David <WH1732> arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and fled <WH1272> <WH8799> that day <WH3117> for fear <WH6440> of Saul <WH7586>, and went <WH935> <WH8799> to Achish <WH397> the king <WH4428> of Gat <WH1661>.

And the servants <WH5650> of Achish <WH397> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Is not this David <WH1732> the king <WH4428> of the land <WH776>? did they not sing <WH6030> <WH8799> one to another of him <WH2088> in dances <WH4246>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Saul <WH7586> hath slain <WH5221> <WH8689> his thousands <WH505>, and David <WH1732> his ten thousands <WH7233> ?
And David <WH1732> laid up <WH7760> <WH8799> these words <WH1697> in his heart <WH3824>, and was sore <WH3966> afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of <WH6440> Achish <WH397> the king <WH4428> of Gat <WH1661>.

And he changed <WH8138> <WH8762> his behaviour <WH2940> before <WH5869> them, and feigned himself mad <WH1984> <WH8704> in their hands <WH3027>, and scrabbled <WH8427> <WH8762> on the doors <WH1817> of the gate <WH8179>, and let his spittle <WH7388> fall down <WH3381> <WH8686> upon his beard <WH2206>.
Then said <WH559> <WH8799> Achish <WH397> unto his servants <WH5650>, Lo, ye see <WH7200> <WH8799> the man <WH376> is mad <WH7696> <WH8693>: wherefore then have ye brought <WH935> <WH8686> him to me?

Have I need <WH2638> of mad men <WH7696> <WH8794>, that ye have brought <WH935> <WH8689> this fellow to play the mad man <WH7696> <WH8692> in my presence? shall this fellow come <WH935> <WH8799> into my house <WH1004> ?
